summary: A knight finds his village destroyed and abandoned. He tries to track the attackers down and avenge his family, but almost drowns. A maiden, prisoner of Black Knight, saves him, so he vows to free her, even though she warns him not to.
cast: Tony Vogel|James Gibb|John Young|Patricia Christian|Colin Booth|Yvonne Finlayson|Ian MacMillan
title: Black Angel
